attributes.action: Prevent Gordon Brown from standing for Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He hides behind the "Green Banner" to rob the poor and give to, well no one knows the NHS is in tatters, British Forces have no money, what Police, Nurses what are they, See a doctor after 5pm umm, The roads and falling apart, Schools enough said there then. But we are leading the way in being greener because we are taxed higher! Why should we lead the world in being green its time to listen to us "the people" let another country lead, tax is way to high and we are not seeing anything for it, no one would mind paying higher tax if we could see improvements and NOT reductions. Put some of the tax towards dental treatment for the ones that can't get to see an NHS dentist. After all that he wants to be Prime Minister. Sounds like a sketch from the young Ones to me…. 
Just sign you know it makes sense and they will have to listen.
